Title: Requires manufacturers of consumer goods to accept for collection, handling and recycling or reuse, consumer goods waste for which it is the manufacturer
Summary: Requires manufacturers of consumer goods to accept for collection, handling and recycling or reuse, consumer goods waste for which it is the manufacturer; requires manufacturers of consumer goods to provide a consumer goods waste acceptance program, and be responsible for all costs associated with the implementation of such program.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 31 §§27-3101 - 27-3106, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to requiring manufacturers of consumer goods to accept for collection, handling and recycling or reuse, consumer goods waste for which it is the manufacturer
